description: Optimization configuration for Statistical Arbitrage H5 - Risk Parameter Tuning
goal: Increase Sharpe from 0.127 to 0.7+ by tuning position sizing and stop loss

parameters.name: position_size_per_pair
parameters.description: Position size per pair (baseline: 0.25 = 25%). Increase to boost returns.

parameters.name: stop_loss_z
parameters.description: Stop loss Z-score threshold (baseline: 5.5). Lower = tighter risk control, higher = more room.

parameters.name: max_holding_days
parameters.description: Maximum holding period in days (baseline: 20). Affects trade exit timing.

rationale: Strategy shows positive edge (60% win rate, 1.22 P/L ratio) but is too conservative (2.3% DD). Increasing position sizes and adjusting stop loss should improve risk-adjusted returns.
